author: Jake Rill
title: NHL Mock Draft 2020: Predictions for Alexis Lafreniere and Top Prospects
description: Jack Hughes turned 18 on May 14, 2019. A month later, he was selected by the New Jersey Devils with the No. 1 overall pick in the  NHL  draft. And by October, he was getting substantial ice time for the team...
content:
Petr David Josek/Associated Press
Jack Hughes turned 18 on May 14, 2019. A month later, he was selected by the New Jersey Devils with the No. 1 overall pick in the NHL draft. And by October, he was getting substantial ice time for the team.
That's how quick… [+4564 chars]
